content: अहि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Killing; pervaded, pervading. --हिः [आहंति, आ-हन-इण स च डित् आङो थस्वश्च <ls>Uṇ. 4. 137</ls>] {@--1@} A serpent, snake; अहयः सविषाः सर्वे निर्विषा डुंडुमाः स्मृताः <ls>Ks. 14. 84.</ls> {@--2@} The sun. {@--3@} The planet Rāhu. {@--4@} A traveller. {@--5@} The demon Vṛtra. {@--6@} A wicked man. {@--7@} A cheat, rogue. {@--8@} The Aśleṣā Nakṣatra. {@--9@} Water. {@--10@} Earth. {@--11@} A milch cow. {@--12@} Lead. {@--13@} The navel. {@--14@} A cloud. --ही (<ab>du.</ab>) Heaven and earth. [<ab>cf.</ab>, <ab>L.</ab> {%anguis%}, <ab>Gr.</ab> {%ehis%}].
